description:
python-twisted-web = 8.2.0 is not OK with nova-objectstore.

I updated python-twisted-{core,web} to version 10.1.0 - now my problem is gone!
http://paste.openstack.org/show/264/
title: Need to add a dependency for python-twisted >= 10.1.0
